site_url.description: The URL of the website being monitored.

search_type.description: The type of search (e.g., web, image, video).

date.description: The date of the search data collected.

country.description: The country where the search is made.

device.description: The device type used for the search (e.g., desktop, mobile).

page.description: The page URL on which the keyword appears in search results.

query.description: The search query used to find the site.

clicks.description: The number of clicks for the keyword on a specific page.

impressions.description: The number of times the keyword appeared in search results.

ctr.description: Click-through rate which is the percentage of clicks divided by impressions.

position.description: The average position of the keyword on search results pages.
